title: Coming to Terms With Being a Theoretical Ecologist
description: Having done some soul searching while working on PhD applications I've come to the conclusion that just maybe I'm not the ecologist that I thought I was.

title: Goodbye icky Swedish winter and hello to mountains and continued learning
